sentences.en: Many are made to be put in the tombs of the elite in order to serve the tomb owners in the afterlife.
sentences.cn: 许多是为了被置于精英的坟墓里而作，以便在来世为坟墓主人服务。

sentences.en: While careful planning for the afterlife may lie buried underground in Cairo, it is noise and confusion on the streets.
sentences.cn: 虽然对来世的周密计划可能被埋在开罗的地下，但街道上却是喧嚣和混乱。

sentences.en: I believe in a physical afterlife.
